tasks.title: Fix TypeScript Decorator Compilation Errors in @n8n/api-types
tasks.description: Resolve TS1240 errors in execution-profile.dto.ts preventing successful build compilation
success_criteria: @n8n/api-types package builds successfully without TypeScript errors
All decorator signature issues resolved
Build process completes for all 42 packages
No regression in existing functionality

tasks.title: Fix Linting Errors in @n8n/utils Package
tasks.description: Resolve linting violations in @n8n/utils package to achieve 100% lint compliance
success_criteria: @n8n/utils package passes linting without errors
All ESLint rule violations resolved
Lint process completes successfully for all 44 packages
Code quality standards maintained

tasks.title: Verify and Fix Test Execution After Build Resolution
tasks.description: Ensure all test suites execute successfully after build and lint issues are resolved
success_criteria: All test suites execute without build dependency failures
Test coverage meets or exceeds 95% requirements
No test failures due to compilation issues
Complete test execution across all 42 packages

tasks.title: Create Quality Improvement Tasks
tasks.description: Analyze project quality issues and create specific tasks to reach 100% quality for all strikes
tasks.prompt:
Project quality assessment shows issues preventing 100% strike success:

Quality Status:
- Strike 1 (Build): 100%
- Strike 2 (Lint): 70%  
- Strike 3 (Tests): 80%

Issues Found:
- Lint and Code Quality: No ESLint configuration found
- Test Coverage and Success: No coverage script defined

TASK: Analyze these quality gaps and create specific improvement tasks to bring ALL strikes to 100% quality. Create tasks for:
1. Build issues (missing dependencies, build failures, configuration)
2. Code quality issues (lint errors, style violations, code standards)
3. Testing issues (failing tests, missing coverage, test setup)

Insert all improvement tasks BEFORE the strike review tasks. Strikes should always remain last in the task list.
success_criteria: All quality issues identified and analyzed
Specific improvement tasks created for each quality gap
Tasks properly prioritized and ordered before strikes
Clear path to 100% quality established

strike2.name: Lint and Code Quality
issues: TODO comments in ESLint config need resolution

quality_analysis.pathTo100: Created 3 specific improvement tasks to address remaining quality gaps

tasks.title: Fix Linter Errors - IMMEDIATE
tasks.description: Fix 3 errors and 0 warnings found in recently edited files: fixtures-integration.test.ts
success_criteria: All linter errors in edited files resolved
development/linter-errors.md shows no issues for edited files
Code passes linting without warnings or errors

tasks.title: Fix Test Compilation Errors
tasks.description: Resolve TypeScript compilation errors in test files preventing tests from running successfully
success_criteria: All TypeScript compilation errors in tests resolved
All test suites pass without compilation errors
Test coverage maintains at least 95% success rate

tasks.title: Enhance Test Coverage and Documentation
tasks.description: Improve test coverage to reach 100% and add comprehensive test documentation
success_criteria: Test coverage reaches 95%+ for all metrics
Coverage reports are properly generated
All edge cases and error scenarios are tested

tasks.title: Optimize ESLint Configuration
tasks.description: Remove TODO warnings and optimize ESLint rules to achieve 100% code quality
success_criteria: All TODO comments in ESLint config resolved
ESLint rules optimized for code quality
No warnings or temporary rule overrides
